name: Space Hodsola
description:
Destroy opponents and survive in any way. You will have to participate in epic space battles, where you alone will fight with countless legions of opponents. Your only assistants are your faithful laser and destructive missiles carrying death to your enemies.

Features:

  • 26 interesting levels worked out
  • Lots of enemy ships with different attack styles
  • Fast paced space combat
  • A spectacular battlefield
  • Beautiful graphics from @ Pixel-boy-boy
